protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-2457
protocol.text: One biological replicate consisted of the pooled aboveground tissues plus roots from 30 Arabidopsis plants.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-2458
text: Samples are prepared for hybridisation to the GeneChip by preparing a probe cocktail (cRNA @ 0.05ìg/ul) that includes 1x Hybridisation Buffer (100mM MES, 1m NaCl, 20mM EDTA, 0.01% Tween-20), 0.1mg/ml Herring Sperm DNA, 0.5mg/ml BSA, and 7% DMSO. A total hybridisation volume of 300ìl is prepared for each sample and 200ìl loaded into a GeneChip. The chip is hybridised at 45C for 16 hours in an oven with a rotating wheel at 60rpm.

(Parameters: Chamber type = Affymetrix- GeneChip Hyb Oven 640, Quantity of label target used = 10, Mass unit = Micro gram, time = 16, Tiny time unit = hours, Volume = 200, Volume unit = Micro litre, temperature = 45)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-2459
protocol.text: Plants were treated with methyl jasmonate (MeJA 0.1 uM) or mock controls for six hours, one hour after lights went on in plant room(Anderson et al. 2004 Plant Cell 16: 3460-3479).

protocol.name: P-MTAB-2460
text: Total RNA was extract from ground tissue frozen in liquid nitrogen using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-MTAB-2461
text: Arabidopsis plants were grown in soil for 5 weeks under the following day/night conditions (24°C 8h of 180 microM light, 20°C 16h of dark, 70% relative humidity) in dedicated plant growth rooms.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C)
